thread.title: Kyle J. Keskey
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Kyle J. Keskey

author: Kyle J. Keskey
title: Kyle J. Keskey
text: My book arrived in excellent shape just like it was advertised. The only thing I'd like to see is a waterproof/resistant bag protecting the book from the elements. I live in Michigan on the shores of Lake Superior and we get a lot of snow which worried me, but the book came out of the box in pristine condition. I plan on ordering more books from Biblio in the future!
